name: Pathstow Mystery VR
description:
Pathstow Mystery VR is a mystic adventure game with a touch of horror and built from the ground up for VR. Created as a SteamVR exclusive it uses all advantages of Room-scale and SteamVR controllers. Steam Audio solution improves quality of sound effects in VR.

Feel the atmosphere of Pathstow. Pathstow is the town where your friend Max Charlton lives.
Max Charlton asked you to help him with something... supernatural in his new house in Pathstow. Investigate environment, solve puzzles and find out Pathstow's secret!

The story is broken down into five episodes of around 15 to 30 minutes in length to allow for intervals in play while enjoying the story.

To prevent any problems with motion sickness game supports teleportation movement system.
